title: Sidra101
author: Sidra101
content: A bear market can be a frustrating time for bitcoin entrepreneurs mostly, but those who are able to adapt and navigate the market conditions can still be successful, meanwhile. A bear market can make it even more unpredictable, increased competition and lower profit margins for existing bitcoin entrepreneurs.I think there're more problems facing bitcoin entrepreneur in a bear market that I don't even know about as a Newbie.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Don't look so much on the negative side, which I don't even see except for the weak hands that sold off their Bitcoins at losses because they FOMOed and bought BTC at it's peak. A bear market is an opportunity for you to stack up more Bitcoins in preparation for the Bull market. Not so long ago, Bitcoin was worth about $16K, today it's almost 100% ROI since then, and I can bet there are so many people regretting and wishing they had bought more Bitcoins at that time

comments.author: roslinpl
comments.created_time: April 11, 2023, 11:38:10 PMLast edit: April 16, 2023, 08:15:58 PM by roslinpl
comments.body: Now the bitcoin community was in good mood by the pump of the bitcoin price. Now the price of bitcoin had crossed new high of 30,200$, it was expected one as compared to the previous price of bitcoin. It was hard for bitcoin to cross the value of 30k dollars over a month. But the same price of bitcoin had crossed the 30k dollars due to some good number of investors into bitcoin investments after the first quarter of this year. Now the bear market was over with the pump and you can cash out bitcoin to fiat with some profits. Whenever the price of bitcoin had reduced due to bear market, it’s essential one of the new people to buy some coin at the dump in the price of bitcoin. Holding for the longer period is important one.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Sidra101 on April 11, 2023, 01:47:42 PMI think there're more problems facing bitcoin entrepreneur in a bear market that I don't even know about as a Newbie.You even don't know but yet you say these words, it might you now a suspect of spreading FUD. Since you're here in Bitcointalk it should be you giving a positive side of Bitcoin not guessing a negative side.Because giving positive insight is a simple yet powerful way to strengthen a community and promote its growth and success, not spreading lies and FUDs.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: There is no need to get frustrated with the bitcoin bear market, because it will always happen. You already know after the bear market there will be a bull market that all bitcoin traders look forward to. But for those who are not affected by bear markets or bull markets are those who trade futures, they have up and down options to be able to make profits from both conditions, but the risk will certainly be greater. comments.author: Bazzu
comments.body: of course for some people the bear market is a dark time and this applies to those who sell btc at a loss, and can't hold back.but for some people a bear market is a good moment tobuy btc and accumulate as much btc.so for me personally a bear market is a good time to buyand bull markets are a good time to sell.so in case of a bear market we have to have positive thinking and a good strategy.

comments.author: Ronsbit
comments.body: Quote from: Sidra101 on April 11, 2023, 01:47:42 PMA bear market can be a frustrating time for bitcoin entrepreneurs mostly, but those who are able to adapt and navigate the market conditions can still be successful, meanwhile. A bear market can make it even more unpredictable, increased competition and lower profit margins for existing bitcoin entrepreneurs.I think there're more problems facing bitcoin entrepreneur in a bear market that I don't even know about as a Newbie.Mate,as a bitcoin enthusiast you are, you should see bear markets as an opportunity. An opportunity to invest more by filling your bags. If you look at the dip, you can not invest but panic sell. Hold for a long term and watch as it grows everyday. Bitcoin price was far below $17K months past but now $30k and still going high. Does this not tell you anything OP. If I  were you, I would do away with FUD and key in. This is not a financial advise as you are required to do your own research.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: As the people say — "bear markets are for building". Price volatility can be very distracting for a lot of people, and a slow and steady price decline should make "Bitcoin entrepreneurs" focus on building code instead of watching charts all day.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on April 12, 2023, 01:37:02 AMAs the people say — "bear markets are for building". Price volatility can be very distracting for a lot of people, and a slow and steady price decline should make "Bitcoin entrepreneurs" focus on building code instead of watching charts all day.People with rocky belief in Bitcoin will not watch the chart daily especially in bear market. They would shift their priority to other things like working harder to earn  more money to buy more cheap bitcoins, saving more money and use their saving to buy bitcoins.Rather than watching the chart daily and feel stressful or disappointed, work harder and hang out to enjoy your life. The market will not stop because of you and time will help it to finish the bear market and start its new bull run.Bear market is very challenging for people who don't have diamond hands to hold their bitcoins.

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.body: so an investor in btc must have a lot of knowledge and must have a positive mind, and must be able to take advantage of opportunities.because for people who don't have experience and insight a bear market is a scary market but for people who have insight and experience a bear market is a market that will provide good opportunities.for example now the price of btc has touched the price of 30,000 dollars, and I'm sure people who buy at 19,000 already have a good profit, and of course people who don't dare to buy btc at lower prices must have regretted it a lot because they didn't buy btc when the market was bearish and when the price of btc is in the range of 19000 dollars.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Bitcoin is a volatile assets which means the price keep on fluctuating up and down because it is the nature. Last year from June to December was the bearish market,so many weak hands couldn't be patient to hold their coins. Instead,due to panic,they sold off their investment thinking that it was the doom time for bitcoin because they lack the knowledge of their investment. This year started the pump from January and at April,the price of bitcoin has hit 30k. Those investors who understand people price movement saw last year bear market, as an opportunity for them to accumulate more bitcoin to their portfolios. Such people will be smiling at the profit now and will be happy for the price increase. We are in the time that bitcoin price is going up gradually, stop talking about the bear market anymore and think on how to join the moving train,by purchasing bitcoin if you have not cause the bearish days are over.

comments.author: Dickiy
comments.body: Quote from: Sidra101 on April 11, 2023, 01:47:42 PMA bear market can be a frustrating time for bitcoin entrepreneurs mostly, but those who are able to adapt and navigate the market conditions can still be successful, meanwhile. A bear market can make it even more unpredictable, increased competition and lower profit margins for existing bitcoin entrepreneurs.I think there're more problems facing bitcoin entrepreneur in a bear market that I don't even know about as a Newbie.I think that's an old song for bitcoin investors who have waded through all kinds of bitcoin market waves but they tend to see a decline is a bullish sign of bitcoin to buy, frustration is normal when it's a bear market and we realize that it has indeed become a mandatory bitcoin cycle which has been a strong symbol of bitcoin and can reach a new ATH again and make bitcoin assets rational with their fluctuations.It's natural for you as a beginner, but you are lucky enough because you haven't experienced the pain in quarter 4 of 2022 which made bitcoin fall to $ 15k, but  today bitcoin returned to the price of $ 30K and make sure if you buy at $ 15k you can already benefit, So I think this way of looking at the ups and downs is what stresses you out, and maybe you'll get used to it if you have a lot of experience in bitcoin cycles going forward.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: If you can't accept bear market, you're better to not invest because every commodities have their own bear and bull market. If you're want to make more money via investment, you also need to accept lose because investment will not always positive, it's a ponzi scheme if someone offer guarantee 100% profit without any risk.As long as the Bitcoin holder can wait for at least 4 years, he's high likely will make a profit.

comments.author: laurenB7742
comments.body: For those who don't understand how the market works, a bear market is a scary thing for them because not only have they not made a profit, but they have also suffered heavy losses. But for those who have experienced one or more bear seasons and understand how the market works, the bear season is more of a season to look forward to than a bull season. I myself am looking forward to a longer bear season and more bitcoin declines, so that I have more opportunity to accumulate bitcoin at a cheaper price.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Sidra101 on April 11, 2023, 01:47:42 PMA bear market can be a frustrating time for bitcoin entrepreneurs mostly, but those who are able to adapt and navigate the market conditions can still be successful, meanwhile. A bear market can make it even more unpredictable, increased competition and lower profit margins for existing bitcoin entrepreneurs.I think there're more problems facing bitcoin entrepreneur in a bear market that I don't even know about as a Newbie.Why focus on the negative side of the bear market? You know who are the ones who are thinking that way? Newbies like you who don't fully understand the market. Well, you said that you're a newbie anyway, so I guess you need to do some research and educate yourself as well.It's frustrating not only to Bitcoin entrepreneurs like you mention, but even for the investors who bought Bitcoin at it's peak or near to it. On the other hand, there are traders who are still profiting whether it is a bull or a bear market. Overall, there are some benefits of bear market still especially if you took the opportunity, and bought it at a lower price. Bear market being unpredictable? In what way?Like you said, investors and entrepreneurs really need to adopt to how Bitcoin moves, so that they will be a successful one, and earn profits from either bull or bear market.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: There many benefits on the bear market as it is in the bull market. Some people want the bear market to stay long before the bull market. When you purchase enough bitcoin at the bear market for about 2 years and bitcoin begins to rise up. You will be very happy to save such coins at that time. So don't say that bear market frustrating. It can only frustrating when you don't understand the market survey. Both the two side of the coin is unpredictable. I am not afraid of the bear market again but it was in my early days on the ecosystem but for I have gotten or use to it. Don't put your mind on the market like that whether the it is bear or bull just remove your mind. And focus on the business.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: As there are two movements in the market, bear and bull, and everyone wants bull, bear market must exist in order to create a balance. Bear market also comes with many benefits, including time to accumulate and the ability to learn from the market. I think it's time to conduct extensive research and learn more about risk management because most people fall prey to frauds with the hope of seeing their assets double, but with thorough research, you can always determine what investments are wise or foolish, and the best advice is to avoid futures.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Can you provide a logical explanation or source for why you mentioned the Bitcoin bear market? Despite Bitcoin almost doubling from its previous low of around $15.5K, it still appears to be struggling to gain momentum. However, I don't believe it is in a bear market, as the price has stabilized and is slowly increasing, making it seem more bullish. In my opinion, we are currently experiencing a soft bull market, and I disagree with the original poster.
